keyPolicies.policyDescription: To stand firm against the SNP's plans for another divisive independence referendum.
To hold the SNP to account for its failure to deliver the new sick kids hospital - now many years overdue.
To secure more investment in vital local transport infrastructure and improvements to local roads.
To defend the constituency from overdevelopment.

issues.health: To hold the SNP to account for its failure to deliver the new sick kids hospital - now many years overdue.

housing.content: To defend the constituency from overdevelopment.
